amendment.description: Amendments sought to strike $54 million for payment of U.N. international organization arrearages and $46 million for payment of U.N. international peacekeeping activities arrearages.
amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of amendment Nos. 2 and 3 in the Congressional Record of July 29, 1997, to eliminate the $100 million in funding to pay dues arreages to the United Nations.

action.text: On agreeing to the Bartlett amendments (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 242 (Roll no. 458).
